text.autoconfig.bedtweaks.title: BedTweaks
text.autoconfig.bedtweaks.option.allowAn: If true, allows to sleep when the current time of day is not valid for sleeping.
text.autoconfig.bedtweaks.option.allowWi: Allow to sleep without bed range
If true, allows you to sleep if you are out of bed range.
text.autoconfig.bedtweaks.option.allowNe: If true, allows to sleep when monsters are nearby.
